text: Curse of Chucky is a 2013 American slasher movie and the sixth installment of the Child's Play franchise. The movie was written and directed by Don Mancini, who created the franchise. It stars Brad Dourif as Chucky and Fiona Dourif as Nica Pierce. The movie made $3.4 million in DVD sales. The movie received strong positive reviews. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:2013 horror movies Category:Child's Play movies Category:Movies directed by Don Mancini Category:American sequel movies Category:2010s sequel movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:American horror movies Category:American supernatural movies Category:2010s supernatural movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Direct-to-video movies Category:2013 LGBT movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies set in Rhode Island Category:Movies about revenge Category:Slasher movies Category:Movies featuring puppetry Category:Adultery in movies
title: Curse of Chucky
